summary: Something I enjoy for my game to give it a bit more of a fantasy JRPG feeling.
descriptionHtml:
After years and years of lurking the nexus for awesome mods made by the community for Skyrim and Fallout 4, I have come out of the shadows to do something spectacular. This simply changes some of the UI sounds (main menu, inventory, and favorites menu) to that of the Kingdom Hearts 2.5 sounds.Â 

[youtube]XDkhzjphW6k[/youtube]

To install, just export into your Skyrim directory and wham! You're ready to slay some heartless.

And thank you to the Nexus community for being spectacular and making my games 10000% more awesome.
author: visagezero
